channel.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
channel.description: Hello, I'm on the level in the "meat locker" like section, the one with the panicking female scientist, and the bullsquid, you need to pick up a nearby red valve to continue on, I cannot! I no-clipped into the section that I needed to get to, but I have found this bug agian, please help! I cannot "cheat" my way past this! please help!

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: cah
item.description:
Spent 5 minutes trying. Somehow I managed to grab it eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Georges
item.description:
Please continue the discussion about this bug here.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: rich189
item.description:
damn, good point… it moves, but it’s on an axis, i can get it to rotate by pressing a prop agianst it, but (no matter how many) grenades do nothing,
what is suppose to happen? If it opens up a new are maybe I could just “noclip” to it

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Blast it out of there with a grenade or whatever. Try everything. So it’s not moving at all and it’s not allowing you to pick it up? Sounds really weird… I say reload a save waaaay back and try again. Even if you could spawn a valve there’s no guarantee that it would ‘fit’ the thing it’s supposed to go on. There couldn’t specifics as to what valve goes where. In another area where there are 2 valves that need replacing 1 only goes on 1 and 1 only goes on the other… which gives the idea that each valve has an intended joiner.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Cybertrance
item.description:
Leijonasisu:

Ah okay. I know the one completely.

Did you turn the other one already? It looks like you did because the steam is coming out of the vents. Or was that from pressing the button? I’m not sure. I think you’re not meant to press the button or something. I can’t remember what I did but I spent quite a bit of time around there trying to get past that area.

I smashed all the boxes, and stuff. I think I turned the first valve, that is already connected. Then pressed the button, then connected the second and turned that.

I’m not sure. If it wasn’t that, then I turned the first valve. Connected the second and then turned it. But I know I didn’t try and connect the valve before I BEFORE I pressed the button or turned the one that is already there.

I’m pretty sure there is a ‘trigger’ that enables you to even pick that valve up. So like you can’t pick it up before you’ve done something. If it’s stuck somehow, try moving or bumping or shooting or even sticking a grenade in there to blow it up, so it moves and see if you can pick it up from a different location.

I always picked up the valve before doing anything…works fine, then i turn both valves and press the button.

Read full topic

item.description:

Did you turn the other one already? It looks like you did because the steam is coming out of the vents. Or was that from pressing the button? I’m not sure. I smashed all the boxes, and stuff. I think I turned the first valve, that is already connected. Then pressed the button, then connected the second and turned that.

I’m not sure. If it wasn’t that, then I turned the first valve. Connected the second and then turned it. But I know I didn’t try and connect the valve before I BEFORE I pressed the button or turned the one that is already there.

I’m pretty sure there is a ‘trigger’ that enables you to even pick that valve up. So like you can’t pick it up before you’ve done something. If it’s stuck somehow, try moving or bumping or shooting or even sticking a grenade in there to blow it up, so it moves and see if you can pick it up from a different location.

what button? and I’ve already tried smashing it with my [trusty] crowbar, and slamming other props into it :L

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Cybertrance
item.description:
Did you try moving it with a prop or something till it falls out of the shelf or something, then try to pick it up?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Ah okay. I know the one completely.

Did you turn the other one already? It looks like you did because the steam is coming out of the vents. Or was that from pressing the button? I’m not sure. I think you’re not meant to press the button or something. I can’t remember what I did but I spent quite a bit of time around there trying to get past that area.

I smashed all the boxes, and stuff. I think I turned the first valve, that is already connected. Then pressed the button, then connected the second and turned that.

I’m not sure. If it wasn’t that, then I turned the first valve. Connected the second and then turned it. But I know I didn’t try and connect the valve before I BEFORE I pressed the button or turned the one that is already there.

I’m pretty sure there is a ‘trigger’ that enables you to even pick that valve up. So like you can’t pick it up before you’ve done something. If it’s stuck somehow, try moving or bumping or shooting or even sticking a grenade in there to blow it up, so it moves and see if you can pick it up from a different location.

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Hmm… I dunno where that is. Can you pull up your saves and see what level you are on? Just hit ESC, then ‘Load Save’ and give me the name of the latest ‘auto-save’.

I’ve played the game through twice now. But it’s hard to remember the level names.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: rich189
item.description:

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Can you take a picture of the valve in question? There are a lot of valves. There might be something else that needs to be done or something.

Either run FRAPS and take a screenshot, or press F12 in Steam.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: rich189
item.description:
no no, it’s always there, I just can’t pick it up at all, and I have, I’ve tried turning my computer off and back on (and that always fixes everything! ), and if it makes any difference I’ve even tried the “reload” command in the prompt, again, would it be possible to spawn one via the command prompt?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
I don’t understand. You’re saying that after messing up the valve in 1 save, when reloading another it’s gone? I don’t understand how that is possible. Close the game and do a reboot.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: rich189
item.description:
I think they set the valve as part of the environment, not a prop, as when I place the cross-air on it and press “E” it makes the noise a switch makes that doesn’t do anything, instead of the one that a prop that is to heavy to pick up makes,

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: rich189
item.description:
I did! multiple times, no luck,
would it be possible to spawn one? and if so, how?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Prop issue! Cannot progress!
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Reload a save point… c’mon how hard can it be. Reload a previous save point and try again. There are multiple automatic auto-saves.

Read full topic
